Greetings everyone, 

I have just added some wonderful new items to my website. Here is the link 
www.nihontocraft.com 

New Swords :

Hayama Enshin Tanto Commissioned by Honami Koson 
--
Kunitoshi Tanto 
--
Kozuke Kanesada Shinto Wakizashi 
--
Bizen Arimitsu Wakizashi 
--
Soshu Style Koto Wakizashi 

For a limited time, there are price reductions on selected swords and 10% off 
on all books. Please have a look if you are so inclined. 


Best regards,
Danny Massey
www.nihontocraft.com 

Coming soon : Antique noh theater demon mask, Bingo Mihara katana, Mino Tanto,
